meanings.definition: The study of the psychological and physiological responses to sound.
meanings.sent1: Psychoacoustics helps us understand how our mind and body react to different sounds.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in psychoacoustics investigate how people perceive various types of sounds.
meanings.sent3: Learning about psychoacoustics is like discovering the secret language of our ears and brain.
meanings.sent4: In the world of psychoacoustics, sound waves become whispers that shape our emotions.
meanings.sent5: The field of psychoacoustics paints a vivid picture of how sound influences our well-being.

meanings.definition: The branch of science dealing with the perception of sound.
meanings.sent1: Psychoacoustics explores how we interpret and make sense of the sounds around us.
meanings.sent2: Scientists in psychoacoustics study how our brains process and understand different noises.
meanings.sent3: When you dive into psychoacoustics, you enter a world where ears hold the power of perception.
meanings.sent4: The realm of psychoacoustics is a symphony of signals that our minds decode effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Understanding psychoacoustics is like deciphering a complex musical score of our auditory experiences.
